channel.title: Castle wars help me please
channel.description:
Hello guys, thanks for reading this before anyone says use search bar or whatever I did but I just keep finding more topics requesting a tutorial. I don't even want a tutorial I already have some of the castle wars done... The problem is I want the player to spawn inside the castle, but he spawns outside... I tried to go inside to get the co-ords but none of the doors to the castle work and the stairs won't work either... I used no-clip and I got the spawn done for each of the teams, but then they are stuck inside the spawn place... So can someone teach me how I can make a person teleport to another location if he presses on the object,
Example: I press on the door I get teleported to the other side of the door... I press the stairs I go to the upper level, or the lower level...
Also can someone tell me how I can add the scoring system and the flag system... I also want to make it so that the person is forced to wear the hood and cape and they can't take it off... And how do I make them not lose items, like if you get killed you just spawn back at spawn point and you don't lose anything... Also how do I make the health bars change into sharks? so when he presses on table he gets sharks instead...
If you can tell me what to do or teach me I would apreciet it so that next time I know how to do this stuff! :D! thanks!
Again thanks alot to anyone who can help!

item.title: Castle wars help me please
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:6, topic:316167”]stairs would be al most the same just add:

heightLevel += 1;

that will make it go upstairs
figure out going downstairs yourself

for the flag idk,

goodluck ;)[/quote]

I love you lol thanks so much :D!

anyone know about flags please tell me :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2009, 07:55:26 am[/size][hr][quote=“i noob iii, post:6, topic:316167”]stairs would be al most the same just add:

heightLevel += 1;

that will make it go upstairs
figure out going downstairs yourself

for the flag idk,

goodluck ;)[/quote]

I also wanted to ask if it is possible lets say if he is
on one side of the door he goes outside and if he is on other
side he goes inside? can u tell me how to do that i have
co-ords of each side lol

Read full topic

@i_noob_iii wrote:

stairs would be al most the same just add:

that will make it go upstairs

item.title: Castle wars help me please
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:4, topic:316167”]search for the first thi ng wich is object click one… it looks like that
put this under there

        case DOORID:
                teleportToX = XXXX;
                teleportToY = YYYY;
            }
            break;

change “DOORID” to the id of the door
XXXX to coord X
YYYY to coord Y[/quote]

Thanks so how about the stairs? Also how do I make the flag in cwars so like when they take it it is removed and they can score? on their side ofcoarse and thanks soo much :D!

Read full topic

@i_noob_iii wrote:

search for the first thi ng wich is object click one… it looks like that
put this under there

XXXX to coord X

item.title: Castle wars help me please
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

[quote=“i noob iii, post:2, topic:316167”]under


    public void objectClick(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int face2, int GateID) {

        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
            println_debug(
                    "atObject: " + objectX + "," + objectY + " objectID: "
                    + objectID);
        } 

        switch (objectID) {

thats object click one wich is used for doors.
okay then we are going to add this,

        case DOORID:
                teleportToX = XXXX;
                teleportToY = YYYY;
            }
            break;

that should do the trick,

goodluck ;)[/quote]

Thanks for replaying but I am a noob sorry where do I add each one?

Read full topic

item.title: Castle wars help me please
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

under


    public void objectClick(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int face, int face2, int GateID) {

        if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
            println_debug(
                    "atObject: " + objectX + "," + objectY + " objectID: "
                    + objectID);
        } 

        switch (objectID) {

thats object click one wich is used for doors.
okay then we are going to add this,

        case DOORID:
                teleportToX = XXXX;
                teleportToY = YYYY;
            }
            break;

that should do the trick,

goodluck

Read full topic

Hello guys, thanks for reading this before anyone says use search bar or whatever I did but
I just keep finding more topics requesting a tutorial. I don’t even want a tutorial I already
